WorkItem.Description:
I followed the instructions for starting to use Rawr 4 for Mages. But when I got to the part where it says the numbers on the Stats tab should match those on the Character window, I found that they didn't.
 
At first, I thought it might have to do with the buffs I chose (while doing this comparison, my character was totally unbuffed), but that would only explain if the numbers in Rawr were all higher, which they're not. Most Rawr numbers are higher, but Mana and Hit Chance are lower.I followed the instructions for starting to use Rawr 4 for Mages. But when I got to the part where it says the numbers on the Stats tab should match those on the Character window, I found that they didn't.
 
At first, I thought it might have to do with the buffs I chose (while doing this comparison, my character was totally unbuffed), but that would only explain if the numbers in Rawr were all higher, which they're not. Most Rawr numbers are higher, but Mana and Hit Chance are lower.
WorkItem.Summary: [Mage] Stats in Rawr don't match Stats on Character page in game

Comments.Message: Can you post what numbers you have in game with that gear?

I decided to make a new character file (loaded from Armory) with no buffs for a more accurate comparison.

Without buffs, in game, here are my numbers:

Health: 99853
Mana: 72218
Stamina: 4500
Intellect: 3672
Spell Power: 5195
Haste: 3.64%
Hit Chance +10.33%
Mana Regen: 1166
Combat Regen: 870
Crit Chance: 14.35%
Mastery: 18.99

Looking at these numbers, they are all higher in game than in Rawr except for Crit, which is higher in Rawr.
Sorry about the confusing file naming. Just so they don't get confused, here is the second file again, named Galacia2.xml.

The base stats for all classes bar druid and warrior are still at level 80 levels. If you can post what your tooltips say for each of those stats it would help isolate base stats. Do it for fully equipped and naked for comparisons. If possible figures for naked with no talents is even better.

I'm having the  same  issue, stats not matching. 

                                          Rawr                                    Blizz
Spell power                       5481                                 5725
Haste                                8.45                                  5.79
hit matches
Regen                               1079                                 1170
combat  Regen matches
Crit                                     21.2                                 10.69
Mastery Matches
Health Matches
Mana                                76371                      76659


if you want, i can send you whatever  it is you want  off my toon  to help out.
